name: Tightrope Fighter
description:
Tighrope Fighter is a fighting game with a two button gameplay.

This project have been done in one week for the Two Button Jam 2019.

The goal is to push your opponent down from the rope.

Keyboard:

Player one:

  • Move backward: A key or Q key
  • Move forward: D key

Player two:

  • Move backward: right arrow key
  • Move forward: left arrow key

Gamepad:

  • Xbox controller: use RL and RB
  • Playstation controller: use R1 and R2

You can performe 3 different attacks (F = Forward; B = Backward):

  1. Middle punch : F-> F+B
  2. High kick: B -> B+F
  3. Low kick: B+F

Each attack have absolute priority to another one in a Rock, Paper, Scissors style .
